job_title: Anonymous Employee in Warner Robins, GA
pros: HCA was a good company to work for and the Admin Staff at Fairview was superb. The Director of the Department was a wonderful, caring Manager, and a true professional. I actually loved the job and the staff.
cons: There were no down sides. I left because I moved out of the area.
